name: BATIM Final Painting
description:
A Man with a Boris live out there days after a Painting accident.  The Ink Demon watches the perimeter waiting for them to leave.  It's time for this Man to leave.  He paints on last painting.  Now it's on, they have to survive or they might never see light of day, maybe no even another ink drop.  In this Fan Game, you'll have to leave the studio while fighting for your life and solve puzzles.  It's On!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is non-canon game that makes a non-canon backstory for the voice at the end of the unknown teaser we got.

Gamejolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/BATIMFP/422593

End part of prototype is orignal textures for gamejolt(maybe)desk texture not finished.
